column2: UPDATE 2-INSIGHT-Microsoft failed to warn victims of Chinese email hack--former employees SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Dec 30 Microsoft Corp  experts concluded several years ago that Chinese authorities had hacked into more than a thousand Hotmail email accounts
column4: targeting international leaders of China's Tibetan and Uighur minorities in particular - but it decided not to tell the victims
column5: allowing the hackers to continue their campaign
column6: according to former employees of the company.
